page.title: 10THE NEW ESTATE,SWILLINGTON.
page.content: The building of the new estate began in November 1982. The piece of land used was previously the site of Primrose Hill colliery and later wasteland. The new estate was built by the council. It was built in three sections.There are{sheltered bungalows 3 and 5 bedroom{detached houses}and {flats.}In the middle of the new estate there is a{community centre}where bingo is held every Friday night. Every now and again they have coffee mornings and jumble sales. There are appoximately 220 buildings on the new esate.Most people who live there think that the facilities around Swillington are very poor. A lot of the older people said that they would like to see a supermarket built on Astley Lane. Some people think that the new estate is planned very well as estates go but others think its like a maze.
